channel.title: Staff of the Red Orb
channel.description: I just remade staff of the red star made by mironic i think i made this because i saw his staff was a little messed up so i decided to make my own without any flaws that i know of EDIT: due to mironic whining over the name it has been changed to amy's idea [IMG]http://i1127.photobucket.com/albums/l634/lulatundead/staff1.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i1127.photobucket.com/albums/l634/lulatundead/staff2.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i1127.photobucket.com/albums/l634/lulatundead/staff3.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i1127.photobucket.com/albums/l634/lulatundead/staff4.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i1127.photobucket.com/albums/l634/lulatundead/staff5.jpg[/img]

item.title: Staff of the Red Orb
item.dc:creator: @Infinity_Death Infinity Death
item.description:
@Infinity_Death wrote:

@Wanderer Lol, someone repped -1 you and by the way can you get me back to 10?
@Rip4d Yeah, i think i got that when he started bitching…

Read full topic

item.title: Staff of the Red Orb
item.dc:creator: @rip4d rip4d
item.description:
@rip4d wrote:

[quote=“The Wanderer, post:33, topic:399345”][quote author=Infinity Death link=topic=496482.msg3630966#msg3630966 date=1308209798]
Dude i hate to be a dick about your whining bull shit but just shut the fuck up! I’ve changed the name and i haven’t said it was all my idea i took your “idea” and changed the designs into my model because i hate horrid wire frames like yours that’s why i made this in my design stop being an asshole about one model it’s not the end of the world like amy said!
[/quote]
Don’t let him discourage you, this model is quite good. The wireframe is nice and the design is okay. I will look forward to models by you in the future.[/quote]This.

Although it was kinda dick to recreate his model and fix its flaws, its good. But really, don’t go and do that again… it just causes trouble.

Read full topic

item.title: Staff of the Red Orb
item.dc:creator: @the_wanderer The Wanderer
item.description:
@the_wanderer wrote:

Infinity Death:

Dude i hate to be a dick about your whining bull shit but just shut the fuck up! I’ve changed the name and i haven’t said it was all my idea i took your “idea” and changed the designs into my model because i hate horrid wire frames like yours that’s why i made this in my design stop being an asshole about one model it’s not the end of the world like amy said!

Don’t let him discourage you, this model is quite good. The wireframe is nice and the design is okay. I will look forward to models by you in the future.

Read full topic

item.title: Staff of the Red Orb
item.dc:creator: @rip4d rip4d
item.description:
@rip4d wrote:

Infinity Death:

I just remade staff of the red star made by mironic

Hmm… yeah. You were given credits, and your model isn’t copyrighted at all. I see no © either, and you can’t do that now and claim rights since he already made his.

Seriously give up.

item.title: Staff of the Red Orb

item.description:

Exactly. It was BASED off of yours, not stealing and taking credit for. Then he added his own ideas, so it was yours and his.

Now shut the hell up already… Jesus… I don’t want to see new posts in the model section to be about arguing… I want to see models for God’s sake.

item.title: Staff of the Red Orb
item.dc:creator: @rip4d rip4d
item.description:
@rip4d wrote:

He didn’t steal it, he recreated it as my own. Technically, I could say you stole my idea by using prongs, a red shape, and a staff, as so:

Now get over it. Its a fucking model, he didn’t leech it, now did he? If he did, then you should be getting mad, but not at something like this.

item.title: Staff of the Red Orb
item.dc:creator: @amy_webb1 amy_webb
item.description:
@amy_webb1 wrote:

:/ one word change does not change the violations... read the whole law.

++ its based on my exactly the claws, and in his own description it says its based off mine, and if i say no, laws clairify that i am the owner of the model design a black pikachu is still trademark of Nintendo


I don’t understand your issue over this, it’s a model and not a good one at that. The design isn’t the best, plus it isn’t like your world would end because he decided to base a model off yours.

Read full topic

item.title: Staff of the Red Orb
item.dc:creator: @amy_webb1 amy_webb
item.description:
@amy_webb1 wrote:

[quote=“mironic, post:18, topic:399345”][quote author=amy_webb link=topic=496482.msg3630753#msg3630753 date=1308187767]

Trying to recreate in My Designs

impossible i demand you change the name!

Technicly you didn’t trade mark the name so he is allowed to use it, and this is his design of your model. Although i don’t see where the “red star” comes into this at all considerting this is a red ball. So why not Staff of The Red Orb?

The model itself isn’t flawless, nothing is ever flawless. In this model the shaft looks boring with that same bumpy thing going on and it needs more too it.

actually i did trademark it ^^ want the link

How long ago did you trade mark it though? After he made this or before he made it?

Also trade marking something proves he isn’t being immature, but i have to admit if he trade marked it after i commented on the trade mark thing then he is being childish.

befor i released it to here…

Sorry, but i looked at it while ago and it said you’d posted it an hour ago.
[/quote]
Lol no, i took it out of scraps an hour ago so its public O-o…

I can put it back and and take it out to prove my point if you like?[/quote]
It doesn’t matter now though does it? He changed the name and the design is different to yours, so it’s all his now.

Read full topic
